name: Warrior-monk
description: You became a member of a militant monastic order, and were trained in philosophy and martial arts.

exploits.name: Martial technique base
exploits.description: You gain two of the following universal exploits: Trip, Throw, Sidestep, Flying Kick. You may take this exploit again to gain the remaining two exploits.

exploits.name: Martial leap
exploits.description: Increase both your vertical and horizontal JUMP distances by 5'.

exploits.name: Defensive stance
exploits.description: You gain +4 to your MELEE DEFENSE. This does not stack with Drunken Fist.

exploits.name: Weapon synthesis
exploits.description: When using any Oriental weapon, you gain one free unarmed melee atatck whenever you make two weapon attacks.

exploits.name: Drunken fist
exploits.description: When intoxicated through alcohol, you gain +4 to your MELEE DEFENSE. This does not stack with Defensive Stance.

exploits.name: Iron skin
exploits.description: Your training grants you +2 natural SOAK.

exploits.name: Elemental fist
exploits.description: Your fist is surrounded by the glow of elemental energy. The damage type becomes heat, and does an additional +1d6 damage.

exploits.name: Mountain stance
exploits.description: You become as immobile as a mountain. No knockdown or knockback attempt by a creature of your size or smaller will work against you.

exploits.name: Zen mind
exploits.description: You gain +4 to your MENTAL DEFENSE.
